label30: Thanks to its large sensor and fast Leica lens, it allows exposures to a maximum ISO sensitivity of 12500 and thus offers even greater scope for creative experimentation
label31: The Leica X Vario is simply ready to shoot at any moment - like every true Leica
label33: The Leica X Vario's autofocus is fast, extremely precise and perfect for spontaneous and discreet photography
label34: It's also ideal for letting you become a part of the action and capturing life's intimate moments
label35: As the autofocus zone can be selected manually to define the desired plane of sharpness, photographers can compose their pictures exactly as they envisage them in their mind's eye
label9: Even at first glance, it is obvious that the Leica X Vario contains the DNA of the Leica M
label5: The Leica X Vario offers the unique combination of an unusually large sensor with a high performance autofocus zoom lens in a compact camera
label6: Even with a maximum aperture of f/3.5, this combination allows the creative use of planes of sharpness to lend images incomparable plasticity and depth
label7: The wide-angle to telephoto zoom range of the Leica X Vario offers great scope for creative composition, whether used for capturing indoor scenes, sweeping landscapes or intimate portraits
connections: Mini USB 2.0 socket, HDMI socket, special socket exclusively for external Leica EVF 2 electronic viewfinder
label19: This compact camera offers a full-HD video recording option with 1920 x 1080 pixels and 30 full frames per second
label12: The magnesium and aluminum body feels comfortably solid in the hand
label13: At the same time, soft leather trim lends the Leica X Vario reassuring grip characteristics
label10: True to the concept of its role model, it also concentrates on compactness and construction, employing only the finest materials
label11: For instance, the top plate is machined from solid aluminum in the same process as that used for the Leica M
label16: All functions and controls are clearly laid out, and settings can be changed in an instant to meet the needs of any photographic situation
label17: At the same time, the commendably user-friendly menu interface displayed on the high-resolution 3" monitor provides a clear overview of all settings at a glance
label15: When it comes to handling, the Leica X Vario follows the lead of the Leica M and offers a persuasively simple handling concept that is reduced to the bare essentials in all respects
sensor: CMOS sensor, size APS-C (23.6 x 15.7 mm) with 16.5/16.2 million pixels (total/effective), format aspect ratio 3
flashmodes: Auto, auto/Red-Eye, forced on, forced on/Red eye, Slow Sync, Slow Sync/Red eye, Studio
software: Adobe Photoshop Lightroom (free download option after camera registration)
powersupply: Lithium ion battery, rated voltage 3.7 V, capacity 1600 mAh (to CIPA standard)
label29: But the camera also shows its true strengths in difficult lighting situations and failing or low light
aperturerange: From 3.5 to 16 (at 28 mm)/6.4 to 16 (at 70 mm) in 1/3 EV increments
isorange: Automatic, ISO 100, ISO 200, ISO 400, ISO 800, ISO 1600, ISO 3200, ISO 6400, ISO 12500
whitebalancemodes: Auto, Daylight, Cloud, Halogen lighting, Shade, Electronic flash, Manual colour temperature setting, Fine adjustment option for all settings
sensortypesize: CMOS sensor, size APS-C (23.6 x 15.7 mm)
lens: Leica Vario-Elmar 18-46 mm f/3.5-6.4 ASPH. (corresponds to 28-70 mm in 35 mm format), 9 lenses in 8 groups, 2 aspherical lenses
connectivity: Mini USB 2.0 socket, HDMI socket, special socket exclusively for external Leica EVF 2 electronic viewfinder
label21: An integrated wind-cut filter ensures super audio clarity
label20: What's more, the full-HD videos can be saved in Internet-friendly MP4 format and uploaded directly to social media or mobile devices without any need for conversion, allowing inspiring moments to be shared with friends in HD videos
label26: In addition, the required focusing distance and focal length can be set via the focusing ring on the lens
label25: The precise click-detent dials on the top plate allow manual pre-selection of the required shutter speed and aperture values
label24: This is made possible by the ability to switch between automatic and manual control in a split second
label28: The superior performance of the Leica X Vario is revealed in naturally lit situations, and is enhanced by its lens hood
